value.name: Twilight
value.overview: Writer Qi Lianshan wants to adapt his psychological reasoning novel into a script. After seeing Liu Xia, who successfully guide a woman who wants to jump off a bridge with her psychological knowledge, he invites her to be a consultant . In the process of adapting the novel, Qi Lianshan gets deeply attracted by Liu Xia, and in the end, the two gained a successful career and a beautiful love story.
